title: Mansion Wing Chunhua: Parachute Blouse
alternative_title: Mansion Wing Chunhua: Parachute Blouse ; Mansion Yeong Chunhwa ; Mansion Yeong Chunhwa: Parachute Blouse ; 저택 영춘화 ; 저택 영춘화:낙하산지 블라우스
status: Mansion Wing Chunhua: Parachute Blouse ; Mansion Yeong Chunhwa ; Mansion Yeong Chunhwa: Parachute Blouse ; 저택 영춘화 ; 저택 영춘화:낙하산지 블라우스
description:
Description :
        A chilling and sensual possession romance brought on by an endless obsession with one woman. In 1940, during a time of chaos, a beautiful mansion called Yeongchunhwa is built on a secluded island, constructed purely out of a man's deep love for his wife. Over time, the story of the couple associated with the mansion is forgotten, but it is now operated as a guest house by a mysterious 'caretaker' who appears one day. He begins inviting people who must love, following the spirits of the couple, to the mansion...! 'Welcome to the secretive mansion Yeongchunhwa, which will bring endless imagination to you. Here, any form of love is possible. Love and indulge to your heart’s content, as long as the mansion permits.' A luxurious mansion and people visiting for various reasons. Erotic stories for women, drawn by various artists, are now unfolding.

In the first short story, 'Parachute Silk Blouse,' influencers 'Choi Baektan' and 'Yang Suji' win a free accommodation event at 'Mansion Yeongchunhwa' during their 7th anniversary trip. They arrive at the beautiful and splendid mansion and while exploring it, they discover a mother-of-pearl cabinet in a room on the second floor and share a passionate love affair while wearing the antique clothes they found there. However, after that day, 'Suji' starts to notice that 'Baektan' has changed...? 'What is this strange feeling? It's like... he's someone else.' What was the identity of another being that had been waiting for Suji in that place for a long time? (MTL)
